revised_title: Spectra of Flames of Metallic Compounds: Nickel Tetracarbonyl and Organometallic Compounds
tldr: The authors investigate the spectra of flames from metallic compounds, specifically nickel tetracarbonyl and organometallic compounds. They observe a continuous spectrum with some bands and lines belonging to the compounds, and discuss the differences between the spectra of the base and upper part of the flame.
